com.mele.games.hex

Class MapReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mele.games.hex.ui.MapReader

  • public class MapReader
extends java.lang.Object
    TODO: [Long Term] Create the reverse of this class - the MapWriter. This would allow users to graphically design maps and then save the ASCII result for use in future games. The MapReader class reads an ASCII file and uses it to create and populate a hex array based on that file. The file must be in the format below: XY XY XY XY XY XY XY XY XY XY XY XY XY XY In this example a 7 hex wide by 2 hex tall map will be created, where each "X" represents the type (or terrain) of the hex, and each "Y" represents a resident on that hex. TODO: Support groups of residents.
    Author:
    Ayar
